KIA SPORTAGE 2WD 2.0P MT IGNITE 15
Beautiful red Sportage in excellent condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Electric windows and mirrors. Manual transmission and gives a smooth and comfortable drive for you and your family. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this SUV for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.

attributes.description:
KIA DEALER OF THE YEAR - 2022
We the Kia Konfidence Edenvale team pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our esteemed clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125-workshop inspection check as well as DEKRA roadworthy and condition report before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles delivered have a full-service history and are accident free. We infuse ourselves with EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. At Kia Edenvale we will also tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your budget as well. We also offer finance options with all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal possible. CALL US NOW and one of our experienced Kia Konfidence Sales Executives will gladly assist you in making your Vehicle dreams come TRUE.
